name: Fractured Best Pictures Quiz | Movie Fractures | 25 Questions

questions.explanation:
Forrest Gump.

	Starred Tom Hanks.

Annie Hall.

	Starred Diane Keaton and Woody Allen.

Amadeus.

	Starred Tom Hulce and F. Murray Abraham.

Terms of Endearment.

	Starred Deborah Winger, Shirley MacLaine, and Jack Nicholson.

Dances with Wolves.

	Starred Kevin Costner--he won Best Director, too.

Titanic.

	Starred Kate Winslet and Leonardo DiCaprio. This movie won 11 Oscars counting Best Picture, and Kate Winslet was nominated for Best Actress.

Gladiator.

	Starred Russell Crowe, who also won Best Actor.

American Beauty.

	Starred Kevin Spacey and Annette Bening. Spacey won Best Actor.

The Silence of the Lambs.

	Starred Anthony Hopkins and Jodie Foster--both won Oscars, too.

Chariots of Fire.

	Starred Ben Cross and Ian Charleson. Vangelis's musical score won an Oscar, too--this is probably one of the best-remembered movie themes.

Schindler's List & Schindlers List.

	Starred Liam Neeson, Ben Kingsley, and Ralph Fiennes.

Braveheart.

	Starred Mel Gibson. (Sorry about the indelicate clue--this is a fantastic movie.)

Driving Miss Daisy.

	Starred Morgan Freeman, Jessica Tandy, and Dan Aykroyd.

The French Connection.

	Starred Gene Hackman.

Ordinary People.

	Starred Mary Tyler Moore, Donald Sutherland, Tim Hutton, and Judd Hirsch.

The Godfather.

	Starred Marlon Brando, Al Pacino, James Caan, Robert Duvall, and Diane Keaton.

The English Patient.

	Starred Ralph Fiennes, Juliette Binoche, Kristin Scott Thomas, and Willem Dafoe.

questions.text: Won flue oh furry coup coos niece
questions.correct: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest & One Flew Over the Cuckoos Nest
questions.explanation:
One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest & One Flew Over the Cuckoos Nest.

	Starred Jack Nicholson and Louise Fletcher--they both won Oscars. Danny DeVito was in this, too.

Unforgiven.

	Starred Clint Eastwood, Gene Hackman, and Morgan Freeman.

Gone with the Wind.

	Starred Vivien Leigh, Clark Gable, and Olivia de Havilland.

Mutiny on the Bounty.

	Starred Clark Gable and Charles Laughton. David Niven and Jimmy Cagney had cameo roles.

Mrs. Miniver & Mrs Miniver

	Starred Greer Garson, Walter Pidgeon, and Teresa Wright. On Oscar night, director William Wyler was flying a bombing run over Germany. Rent this one if you haven't seen it--it's great!

The Sound of Music.

	Starred Julie Andrews.

Out of Africa.

	Starred Meryl Streep and Robert Redford.

Oliver! & Oliver.

	Starred Ron Moody and Shani Wallis.
